body.summary: Registration of new user from Create your Google account page returns to Homepage google.com
body.environment: Windows 10, Browser: Google Chrome Version 94.0.4606.81 (Official Build) (64-bit)
body.str: <1>Open Homepage: google.com</1> <2>Click on link Sign in</2> <3>Click on Create account</3> <4>Choose For myself item</4> <5>Enter first name in First name input field</5> <6>Enter last name in Last name input field</6> <7>Enter username in Username ... .gmail.com input field</7> <8>Enter password in Password input field (Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers and symbols)</8> <9>Confirm password in Confirm input field</9> <10>Click on Next button</10>
body.actual_result: Registration of new user from Create your Google account page returns to Homepage google.com
body.expected_result: Registration of new user from Create your Google account page ends successfully
